meico.mpm.elements.maps

Class ArticulationMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.maps.GenericMap
        • meico.mpm.elements.maps.ArticulationMap

  • public class ArticulationMap
extends GenericMap
    This class interfaces MPM's articulationMaps
    Author:
    Axel Berndt

                           java.lang.String articulationDefName,
                           java.lang.String noteid,
                           java.lang.String id)
        add an articulation element to the map
        Parameters:
        date -
        articulationDefName - a reference to an articulationDef
        noteid - the xml:id reference to the note (should start with #), it is optional an can be set null
        Returns:
        the index at which it has been inserted

      • addArticulation

        public int addArticulation(double date,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteDuration,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteDurationChange,
                           java.lang.Double relativeDuration,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteDurationMs,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteDurationChangeMs,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteVelocityChange,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteVelocity,
                           java.lang.Double relativeVelocity,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteDelayMs,
                           java.lang.Double absoluteDelay,
                           java.lang.Double detuneCents,
                           java.lang.Double detuneHz,
                           java.lang.String noteid,
                           java.lang.String id)
        add an articulation element to the map, despite the date all attributes can be set null so they are not added to the element
        Parameters:
        date -
        absoluteDuration - numeric value or null
        absoluteDurationChange - numeric value or null
        relativeDuration - numeric value or null
        absoluteDurationMs - numeric value or null
        absoluteDurationChangeMs - numeric value or null
        absoluteVelocityChange - numeric value or null
        absoluteVelocity - numeric value or null
        relativeVelocity - numeric value or null
        absoluteDelayMs - numeric value or null
        absoluteDelay - numeric value or null
        detuneCents - numeric value or null
        detuneHz - numeric value or null
        noteid - the xml:id reference to the note (should start with #), it is optional an can be set null
        Returns:
        the index at which it has been inserted

      • getArticulationDataOf

        private ArticulationData getArticulationDataOf(int index)
        This collects all data of the articulation at the specified map position. If it is no articulation (e.g. a style switch instead) the return value is null.
        Parameters:
        index -
        Returns:

      • findStyle

        private void findStyle(int index,
                       ArticulationData ad)
        get the style that applies to the articulation at the specified index
        Parameters:
        index - the index for which the style data is needed (could be a <style/> element itself)
        ad - style and defaultArticulation will be stored in this ArticulationData object

      • renderArticulationToMap_noMillisecondModifiers

        public void renderArticulationToMap_noMillisecondModifiers(GenericMap map)
        On the basis of this articulationMap, edit the map (preferably an MSM score). This method is meant to be applied BEFORE the other timing transformations and AFTER dynamics rendering. Changes in the millisecond domain are added to the notes as attributes and need to be applied later via method renderArticulationToMap_millisecondModifiers()!
        Parameters:
        map -

      • renderArticulationToMap_noMillisecondModifiers

        public static void renderArticulationToMap_noMillisecondModifiers(GenericMap map,
                                                                  ArticulationMap articulationMap)
        On the basis of the specified articulationMap, edit the map (preferably an MSM score). This method is meant to be applied BEFORE the other timing transformations and AFTER dynamics rendering. Changes in the millisecond domain are added to the notes as attributes and need to be applied later!
        Parameters:
        map -
        articulationMap -

      • renderArticulationToMap_millisecondModifiers

        public void renderArticulationToMap_millisecondModifiers(GenericMap map)
        On the basis of the specified articulationMap, edit the map (preferably an MSM score). This method is meant to be applied AFTER asynchrony has been added to the map and BEFORE imprecision is applied. Also, renderArticulationToMap_noMillisecondModifiers() must have been applied to the map BEFORE this method is invoked as this method expecting the attributes (articulation.absoluteDelayMs, articulation.absoluteDurationMs, articulation.absoluteDurationChangeMs) that have been generated there.
        Parameters:
        map -

      • renderArticulationToMap_millisecondModifiers

        public static void renderArticulationToMap_millisecondModifiers(GenericMap map,
                                                                ArticulationMap articulationMap)
        On the basis of the specified articulationMap, edit the map (preferably an MSM score). This method is meant to be applied AFTER asynchrony has been added to the map and BEFORE imprecision is applied. Also, renderArticulationToMap_noMillisecondModifiers() must have been applied to the map BEFORE this method is invoked as this method expecting the attributes (articulation.absoluteDelayMs, articulation.absoluteDurationMs, articulation.absoluteDurationChangeMs) that have been generated there.
        Parameters:
        map -
        articulationMap -
